sense.gloss: to stumble a step or two forward (when trying to stop), to pass one's destination and stumble a step or two forward, to totter
bellows (of the) imperial harbor, Shinto Buddhist doctrines
Bellows Festival, festival for blacksmiths and foundries on the eighth day of the eleventh month of the lunar calendar, on which they would clean their bellows and pray

words.gloss: to stumble a step or two forward (when trying to stop), to pass one's destination and stumble a step or two forward, to totter
